New Tlds Announced

15 Nov 2000

After a mere glacial delay, ICANN has announced its proposed list of new TLDs. .xxx isn't there (neither is .kids), but why should ICANN start listening to good ideas now?

The list includes:

    \n
  • .biz
    • \n
  • .web
    • \n
  • .name/.nom/.per
    • \n
  • .health
    • \n
  • .geo
    • \n
  • .union
    • \n
  • .museum
    • \n
  • .info
    • \n
  • .air
    • \n
  • .one
    • \n
  • .co-op
    • \n
  • .post
    • \n
  • .event
    • \n

More in ICANN's announcement.
